mapper.insert: insert into sf_user_turn_table (id, user_id, turn_table_id, not_used_times, used_times, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{turnTableId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{notUsedTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{usedTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.select: select id, user_id, turn_table_id, not_used_times, used_times, create_time, update_time from sf_user_turn_table
